api_list.api_description: Set or delete a price alert for a specific game and price.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert ('set' or 'delete').

required_parameters.name: game_id
required_parameters.description: An existing gameID, required for both 'set' and 'delete'.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using 'set' action.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve all cards, or filter them by name, supertype, types, and hp.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the card to filter by.

optional_parameters.name: supertype
optional_parameters.description: The supertype of the card, such as Pokémon, Energy, or Trainer.

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description: The energy types for a card, such as Fire, Water, Grass, etc.

optional_parameters.name: hp
optional_parameters.description: The hit points of the card to filter by.

query: Can you set a price alert for any Pokémon-themed game below $20 and also find me all Pokémon cards with the name 'Pikachu'?
